snippet: LIEBERMAN--Joan, of Great Neck, NY died, peacefully, after a brief illness on June 20, 2016. She was predeceased by her beloved husband Alan. Joan will be forever loved and cherished by her children, Loren, Debra (Chris) and Steven and her grandchildren Arielle, Adam and Brendan. She is also survived by her siblings Dee, Ayn and Nicholas. Rest in Peace Momma. We will honor you always. 1/3
lead_paragraph: LIEBERMAN--Joan, of Great Neck, NY died, peacefully, after a brief illness on June 20, 2016. She was predeceased by her beloved husband Alan. Joan will be forever loved and cherished by her children, Loren, Debra (Chris) and Steven and her grandchildren Arielle, Adam and Brendan. She is also survived by her siblings Dee, Ayn and Nicholas. Rest in Peace Momma. We will honor you always. 1/3
